html:
Volley Inc, a US-based voice game publisher company, has acquired Question of the Day, a voice game on the Amazon Alexa platform, developed by Matchbox.io Inc, a company that develops voice games. Both the companies are based in the US.

The acquisition of Question of the Day accelerates Volley's growth on both Alexa and Google platforms.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-CategoryAsset Purchase
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-02-23

Deal Participants

Acquirer (Company)Volley.com
Vendor (Company)Matchbox
